body: Just wanted to ask what does the media rank means and also the requirements for this rank and the YTer.
body_tagged: Just wanted to ask what does the media rank means and also the requirements for this rank and the YTer.
title: What's the media rank?

replies.body: The media rank is NOT a youtuber rank. The media team's job is to livestream and record tournament matches.
replies.body_tagged: The media rank is NOT a youtuber rank. The media team's job is to livestream and record tournament matches.

replies.body: And the youtuber?
replies.body_tagged: And the youtuber?

replies.body:
No one knows about the famous rank...
It used to be 50K subs but it's been told that we no longer go by that, but there never was an actual announcement of any new requirements.
replies.body_tagged:
No one knows about the famous rank...
It used to be 50K subs but it's been told that we no longer go by that, but there never was an actual announcement of any new requirements.

replies.body: You could add a unofficial rank to your About page as snow added "Retired" to his when he was demoted. Brilliant. XD
replies.body_tagged: You could add a unofficial rank to your About page as snow added "Retired" to his when he was demoted. Brilliant. XD

replies.body: Yeah I just livestream tourney matches for people to watch because my internet is actually good >:D
replies.body_tagged: Yeah I just livestream tourney matches for people to watch because my internet is actually good >:D

replies.body: The rank was created when we had our firsts tournaments. Players were not allowed in the server to spectate a game unless they were a Referee, Official or Media. The media would live stream games for people that had no access to the game through the server. This allowed them to watch regardless
replies.body_tagged: The rank was created when we had our firsts tournaments. Players were not allowed in the server to spectate a game unless they were a Referee, Official or Media. The media would live stream games for people that had no access to the game through the server. This allowed them to watch regardless

replies.body: To become a media, you have to apply when applications are open. There will be a post on the forums when applications are open so keep your eyes open.
replies.body_tagged: To become a media, you have to apply when applications are open. There will be a post on the forums when applications are open so keep your eyes open.

replies.body:
Not sure why you consistently want to make fun of me on the forums.

And you're wrong anyway, not sure why you're making stuff up to make me look bad,
I put all of those ranks on way before I got demoted. There's literally no relation to what you said. (You're lying)

Actually I added all the ranks I have had during my time on Avicus.
Which is why none of them are coloured, because I don't have any of those ranks now.
When I was a Mod and Ref, the ranks were in colour.

It's not exactly difficult to understand.

I stole the idea from Mango, he did the same thing.

"Haha, don't you realize you are making a fool of yourself, you never retired so why would you have the rank? And why would you add a retired rank to your about page when you still were a mod? It doesn't make any sense."

It's not on topic because
1. You are trash talking someone about something that isn't related to the question of the topic
2. I'm sure being on topic means to be talking about what media rank is, not trying to justify to someone who isn't the OP why he didn't retire.

So no, you aren't on topic thus technically breaking the rules. Now just fuck off please, you're turning into Tigger, and I'm sure there's going to be salt on your part if you end up being forum banned.
